Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: jis vakt aafataab kee chaadar ko lapet liya jaega
aur jis vakt taare gir padegen
aur jab pahaad chalae jaengen
aur jab anaqareeb janane vaalee oontaniyon bekaar kar dee jaengee
aur jis vakt vahashee jaanavar ikattha kiye jaayenge
aur jis vakt dariya aag ho jaayenge
aur jis vakt ruhen haviyon se mila dee jaengee
aur jis vakt zinda dar gor ladakee se poochha jaega
ki vah kis gunaah ke badale maaree gayee
aur jis vakt (aamaal ke) daphtar khole jaen
aur jis vakt aasamaan ka chhilaka utaara jaega
aur jab dozakh (kee aag) bhadakaayee jaegee
aur jab behisht qareeb kar dee jaegee
tab har shakhsh maaloom karega ki vah kya (aamaal) lekar aaya
to mujhe un sitaaron kee qasam jo chalate chalate peechhe hat jaate
aur gaayab hote hain
aur raat kee qasam jab khatm hone ko aae
aur subah kee qasam jab raushan ho jae
ki beshak yen (quraan) ek muaziz pharishta (jibareel kee zabaan ka paigaam hai)
jo bade qavee arsh ke maalik kee baaragaah mein buland rutaba hai
vahaan (sab pharishton ka) saradaar amaanatadaar hai
aur (makke vaalon) tumhaare saathee mohammad deevaane nahin hain
aur beshak unhonen jibareel ko (aasamaan ke) khule (sharaqee) kinaare par dekha hai
aur vah gaib kee baaton ke zaahir karane mein bakheel nahin
aur na yah maradood shaitaan ka qaul hai
phir tum kahaan jaate ho
ye saare jahon ke logon ke lie bas naseehat hai
(magar) usee ke lie jo tumamen seedhee raah chale
aur tum to saare jahon ke paalane vaale khuda ke chaahe bagair kuchh bhee chaah nahin sakate
